name: Test06 - Verify Details Of Product Added To Cart
description: This test verifies the details of a product added to the cart

steps.name: business flow - sort products by price Lowest to Highest

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: select[name='orderby']]

parameters.name: productPrice
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: p[class='price']]

steps.name: business flow - choose quantity and add product to the cart

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> relative: {root={tag name=input}, filters=[{kind=near, args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50]}]}]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> relative: {root={tag name=input}, filters=[{kind=near, args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50]}]}]

steps.name: business flow - get product subtotal price

parameters.name: rowElements
parameters.value: [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: td[class='product-name']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: td[class='product-price']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: input[type='number']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (ae7cd63463c6365237a01160656c375e)] -> css selector: td[class='product-subtotal']]]
